issue_name: Denial of Service Vulnerabilities in PROFINET DCP Implementation of Industrial Products

1.command: Update to V4.1.1 Patch04 or newer
1.description: Update Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: DK Standard Ethernet Controller to V4.1.1 Patch04 or newer.

2.command: Update to V4.2.1 Patch03 or newer
